data.eml:eml: Notes on Falsocis Pic (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea: Ciidae), with the description of an endangered Brazilian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano (2007): Notes on Falsocis Pic (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea: Ciidae), with the description of an endangered Brazilian species. Zootaxa 1544: 41-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177945
